**Description:** The anomaly in question is a large rat that has, through an unknown manner, crawled into Site-403's Server Room. It possesses a great size presumed to be rabid and/or violent. The rodent of unusual size is currently gnawing at the cables in the previously mentioned Server Room. This has caused the deletion, addition and modification of many files (including this one), examples are included below and containment efforts are undergoing (and likely being futile).
-------
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
> Hello You All, I'm Guaire, A Spaniard with probably too much free time. I have been on the wiki since late 2021, but I only started writing last year. I have an interest in Paleontology, History and Biology, so expect that and much more from my articles. I hope you enjoy them as much as I did writing them.

+ SCPs

 [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6425 SCP-6425] "Organ Rejection" - 

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6861 SCP-6861] "Sic Semper Tyrannosaurus" -  Features Dinosaurs and American politicians.

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7425 SCP-7425] "Giant Enemy Crab" -  Now i need to eat some seafood.

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7565 SCP-7565] "The quest for the Mokele-Mbembe" - Remixcon Entry. Read this if you like to do colonialism

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/abraka-davids-proposal Abraka David's Proposal] - A magician did it

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8500 SCP-8500] "WTH_LUV_FRM_ADA.zip" - 8kon entry. 

-----------------------

+ Tales

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ghost-riders-in-the-sky Ghost riders in the Sky] - 2022's Halloweencon Cowboys vs Aliens

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-fairhaven-chocolate-factory The Fairhaven Chocolate factory] If you read and upvote it in the next 15 minutes you’ll get a chocolate bar for free.

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/nsl213-pilesaran-and-soonesaran Nälkän Scripts and Languages 213: Pilesaran and Soonesaran] - Collab With Ignota. The script used by the ancient and modern sarkics

-----------

+ GoI Formats

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-virtue-of-resilience Virtue of Resilience] Written alongside ari and nico, tells a story of the last days of the romans, as the turks and internal turmoil threaten to destroy this millenia old empire
---------



+ Outside the SCP Wiki

[https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/100-000-bce 100.000BCE] My first attempt at writing on the Wanderer’s Library and done for the wonderful Picture Palooza contest. If I had written it today i would have done much differently but it was still an important experience in defining my style, as well as writing non-scp stuff.

[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-050-int SCP-050-INT] “Keep Calm and Babble On” - Written with my friends for INT’s collab con. It’s a blast of an article that wouldn't have been possible without any of them.

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="But before you close this window" hide="Upvote it bitch"]]
